data.name: Carry_Line_001
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Carry NPC had his package stolen in Flyaway Cliffs! Please Help!

data.name: Carry_Line_002
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Carry NPC had his package stolen in Flyaway Cliffs! (You already have the quest)

data.name: Carry_Line_003
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Did you back the supplies?

data.name: Carry_Line_004
data.value: [tmp](Carry) We've got to do something about these thieves.

data.name: Carry_Line_005
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Be careful, the Pokemon in the dungeon are smart and use moves more often.

data.name: Carry_Line_006
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Please help us take down this criminal!

data.name: Carry_Line_007
data.value: [tmp](Carry) You brought down the criminal!

data.name: Carry_Line_008
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Thanks for bringing honchkrow down.

data.name: Carry_Line_009
data.value: [tmp](Carry) Thanks for discovering this cave. We're putting supplies there.

data.name: Carry_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp](carry) I'm on my routine route in cliff camp!

data.name: Deliver_Line_003

data.name: Deliver_Line_004
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) We've got to do something about these thieves.

data.name: Deliver_Line_005
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Be careful, no one inside the dungeon will consider joining your team.

data.value: [tmp](Deliver) Please help us take down this criminal!

data.name: Deliver_Line_007
data.value: [tmp](Deliver) You brought down the criminal!

data.name: Dragon_Line_001
data.value: A mighty breath of fire!

data.name: Dragon_Line_002
data.value: An intimidating glare!

data.name: Dragon_Line_003
data.value: Large wings spread wide!

data.name: Dragon_Line_004
data.value: We are Team Dragon![pause=30] Monarchs of the Mystery Dungeon!

data.name: Fairy_Line_001
data.value: Have you ever seen a fairy ring?[pause=0] It's a circle of mushrooms that grow from the forest floor.[br]Stories say they hold a special power...

data.name: Hidden_Line_001
data.value: ...[pause=0]You noticed me.[pause=0]\nGood intuition.[br]Keep me a secret,[pause=0] and I'll tell you mine.[br]Open your map.

data.name: Hidden_Line_002
data.value: The dungeon my partner wants to explore.[pause=0] I'm not interested in going.

data.name: Hidden_Line_003
data.value: Not.[pause=30] One.[pause=30] Bit.

data.name: NextCamp_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]Rumor has it there's a way up the mountains through Copper Quarry.[br]Someone said they found a secret route once, but there was a cave-in right after that.

data.name: Seeker_Line_001
data.value: I wonder where my partner went.[pause=0] We're supposed to explore a new dungeon.

data.name: Seeker_Line_002
data.value: What's that?[pause=0] You want to know where?

data.name: Seeker_Line_003
data.value: Hah![pause=0] I may be the loudest bug of summertime,[pause=30] but you'll never get that intel from me!

data.name: Shiny_Line_001
data.value: Have you met a Shiny Pokémon?[pause=0] They have a different-colored coat that shines wherever they go.

data.name: Shiny_Line_002
data.value: Your coat![pause=0] Look how it sparkles![br]There's no mistaking it,[pause=0] you must be a Shiny Pokémon!

data.name: Shiny_Line_003
data.value: Shiny Pokémon are normally a rare sight,[pause=0] but it's rumored that many like to hide in Monster Houses.

data.name: Shortcut_Line_001
data.value: *It's rumored that the guildmasters took a shortcut to the summit of the mountain, where they lay in wait to bestow their title to a new team.

data.name: Shortcut_Line_002
data.value: Where is this shortcut, you may ask?[br] Why,[pause=0] it's none other than Guildmaster Trail!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_001
data.value: [tmp]I went ahead and set up tent here! I'm waiting for my subordinates to make another trip!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_002
data.value: [tmp]Carry NPC had his package stolen in Flyaway Cliffs! Please Help!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_003
data.value: [tmp]Carry NPC had his package stolen in Flyaway Cliffs! (You already have the quest)

data.name: Storehouse_Line_004
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for getting back the supplies! Have a reward!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_005
data.value: [tmp]We've got to do something about these thieves.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_006
data.value: [tmp]We've got to do something about these thieves.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_007
data.value: [tmp]We've foud the hideout of the outlaw leader. We need your help to take them down!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_008
data.value: [tmp]Beware of the dungeon. Who knows what traps they have set up in their hideout.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_009
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for bringing down the criminal! We reward you with a storage bag!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_010
data.value: [tmp]We use this bag for our supply runs!

data.name: Storehouse_Line_011
data.value: [tmp]Thanks for bringing honchkrow down.

data.name: Storehouse_Line_Route
data.value: [tmp]I'm on my routine route in cliff camp!

data.name: Strategy_Line_001
data.value: The Steel-type Pokemon in Copper Quarry shrugged off all our attacks.[br]We'll need to strategize.[pause=0]\nLet's consider what moves we can use...

data.name: Tutor_Accept
data.value: Alright, let's do it!

data.name: Tutor_Ask
data.value: [tmp]You! A {0}! You're the kind of Pokemon that'd get what I'm talking about![br]Want me to teach you {1}?

data.name: Tutor_Decline
data.value: Come back if you change your mind.

data.name: Tutor_Done
data.value: [tmp]There are other tutors wandering around in the dungeons.[br]They've spent ages training in dungeons without outside contact,[pause=0] but I'm sure they'd enjoy some company.

data.name: Tutor_Incompatible
data.value: [tmp]But the other townsfolk aren't interested in hearing about it.[br]If only there was someone I could share this knowledge with.

data.name: Tutor_Intro
data.value: [tmp]Through my adventures I've learned a special technique, known as {0}!

data.name: Tutor_Taught
data.value: [tmp]By the way...[pause=0]\nI learned this move from a traveling move tutor.[br]He said he'd pass by base town after I spoke to him.
